name: event-management-system
description: Hub for all programs in the EMS suite.

scripts.ems: concurrently --kill-others "cd ems-core/ && npm run desktop" "cd ems-core/ && npm start"
scripts.build-audience: cd audience-display/ && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.build-ref: cd ref-tablet/ && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.build-pit: cd pit-display/ && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.build-core: cd ems-core/ && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.build-all: npm run build-audience && npm run build-ref && npm run build-core
